resources.string: Complete. Open file manager to share?
Do you want to download the file?
Would you like to resubmit your data?
The certificate of the site is not trusted. Proceed anyway?
Clear your browser data or decide what data will be cleared when you leave the application.
Decide which components of the browser will be enabled on start.
Here you can choose your preferred search engine or set a custom one.
If checked, content will be rendered in a inverted grey scale mode. This is a kind of \"night mode\".
Change the font size for displaying websites.
Enable remote content, which is not directly from the website you are visiting. Disabling this is more secure, faster and saves data volume. But some content will not be displayed anymore.
Tell websites that you would prefer to save data. Supported websites will load faster.
Enable Network images. Disabling could be useful to save mobile data and to load websites faster.
If enabled, all cookies will be deleted. Also the Cookies of trusted websites.

Enable Cookies. Cookies are small text files, which are stored on your device. Websites use them for example to store user settings (for example search settings). But they could also be used to collect personal user data. Third party cookies (they collect user data for advertising) are always disabled.
If you disable Cookies, you can use this whitelist to allow sites you trust to use save cookies.
Enable JavaScript. Many websites need JavaScript for their functionality (menus, loading and displaying images, …). But they are also a risk and can be used for attacks.
If you disable JavaScript, you can use this whitelist to allow sites you trust to use javascript.
Enable AdBlock to block annoying ads. Sites also load faster when enabled.
Allow these sites to show ads. Some sites do not work, when AdBlock is enabled.
Allow websites to access your location. Some websites (like Google maps for navigation) need this enabled.
Save the history of visited websites.
All files will be exported to the \"Documents\" directory of your sd-card. Each export will overwrite the old one. To restore there must be a file with the right name in the directory.
Every time you quit \"FOSS Browser\" all above checked data will be deleted.
Delete the whole database (Startpage, bookmarks, history and all whitelists).
更改应用程序的行为和应用界面以适应您的偏好
导入和导出数个应用程序数据 (白名单, 书签)
长按概述中的书签图标显示过滤器对话框，决定使用哪种过滤器
在浏览网站时使用整个屏幕，如果按下后退按钮，将离开全屏模式
在后台显示通知和打开的链接，如果禁用链接将立即打开
为应用界面中的一些元素着色以匹配网站的颜色
在返回历史记录之前，按下back将使工具栏可见
决定“导航按钮”将放置在何处
当工具栏显示时，隐藏“导航按钮”
在“概览”的开头应该显示开始页面，你的书签...
关闭浏览器时确认对话框
关闭选项卡时确认对话框
只有在向下滚动的时候
打开每个应用程序启动时的“概述”
在展开的概述选项卡预览将隐藏，这样拥有更多地方存放书签
仅在扩展概述以更舒适地切换标签时显示标签预览
使用工具栏上的手势和“导航按钮”
重新打开最后一个选项卡
在关闭最后一个选项卡而不是退出浏览器时重新打开一个新选项卡
Export the whole database (Startpage + previews, History, Bookmarks) to your sd-card.
This will delete all your current settings and data. Will you proceed?
\"FOSS Browser\" is completely free (as in freedom) and open source.
Open the system app settings for \"FOSS Browser\". There you can, depending on your Android version grant permissions, clear the app data and so on.
See who contributed something to this project. Or do you want to help with further development, report an issue or just get the latest news relating to my projects?
Show the latest changelog to see what\'s new.
Successfully opened in a new tab
Do you really want to delete the entry?
Entry already exists. Please enter new title.
Do you really want to clear?
\"FOSS Browser\" needs the permission to \"read and write on your storage\". This is needed to download files, taking screenshots and making backups of your data.
\"FOSS Browser\" needs the permission to \"access your location\". This is requested from some websites for example when they offer some kind of navigation.
You must restart \"FOSS Browser\" to apply changes. Close now?
Do you want to quit \"FOSS Browser\"?
Do you want to close current tab?
This website uses an unsecured connection (\"http\"). Do you want to try a secure connection (\"https\")?
Backup data? This will overwrite the old backup.

Favorite
You can decide which site loads when \"FOSS Browser\" starts: By long pressing an entry in the overview (Startsite, Bookmarks, History) you can choose it. Over the menu of the overview you can also set a blank favorite.

Menus and dialogs
All menus and dialogs are opened at the bottom of the screen. If the dialog is large you will first see only the upper part. If you swipe it up, the rest will get visible.
You can close them by pressing the back button, swiping them down or by clicking outside

Long press
If you long press the menu icon or the \"Navigation button\", the \"Fast toggle dialog\" will show. If you long press the \"Bookmark icon\", the \"Filter dialog\" will show.

There are two parts in the \"Overview\" (tab preview and personal data). There is an extra menu. In the settings you can change the behavior of the \"Overview\".

Tab preview
It is the upper part of the \"Overview\". To change tabs just click the preview. To close a tab long press the preview. If you swipe the tab preview up, your personal content will open.

Personal content
There are three parts: the Startsite, your Bookmarks and your History. If you long click an entry a menu with more options will appear.

On the toolbar and the \"Navigation button\" you can use gestures:

Toolbar
\u25AA swipe up/down \u2192 show Overview/nothing
\u25AA swipe left/right \u2192 change tabs

Navigation button
\u25AA swipe up/down \u2192 scroll up/down
\u25AA swipe left/right \u2192 previous/next in history

You can change this in the settings.

You can tag your bookmarks with colors. In this way you can group your bookmarks. You can open the filter dialog by long pressing the bookmark icon. If you long press on an entry, you can edit its name. In the settings you can disable unused entries.

Your language isn\'t supported yet? You want to translate FOSS Browser? Or make improvements to existing translations? Feel free to join us on Crowdin: https://crowdin.com/project/foss-browser.

On the following sites you have access to all important information about \"FOSS Browser\". Please read also the help dialog within the app.

\u25AA Project site: https://github.com/scoute-dich/Browser
\u25AA Changelog: https://github.com/scoute-dich/browser/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md
\u25AA FAQ: https://github.com/scoute-dich/browser/blob/master/FAQs.md
\u25AA License: https://github.com/scoute-dich/browser/blob/master/LICENSE.md
\u25AA Privacy: https://github.com/scoute-dich/browser/blob/master/PRIVACY.md

For more information visit the project site on Github: https://github.com/scoute-dich/Browser

See the GNU General Public License for more details. You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this program. If not, see http://www.gnu.org/licenses.

hummatli

First I would like to thank all people who contributed in any way on this project. They submitted issues, translated or helped in any other way. On following sites you can become a active member of this great community:

Crowdin:
Crowdin is an online plattform to translate applications in other languages. A big thanks to all translators. You can also help.
https://crowdin.com/project/foss-browser

XDA-thread:
XDA is a great community for developers and smartphone enthusiasts. Here you can report issues, ask for new features and everything other related to \"FOSS Browser\".
https://forum.xda-developers.com/android/apps-games/app-browser-t3500091

Github:
On Github you can see the source code of \"FOSS Browser\". This is the more technical solution: open issues, ask for new features or even help developing or translating.
https://github.com/scoute-dich/browser


Following people contributed at this project. If I have forgotten anybody, please contact me:
